attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
stop cls funding being abused by people who are taking and being given any amount they ask for by getting solicitors to constantly add extentions onto ther funding, for more personal fights.
by requesting people make a payment towards it even if unemployed as many people are delibratly staying unemployed to keep collecting cls funding as it appears very easy to do so.as if people are intrested in bringing up a case against some body they will be happy to contibute towards it
  and allow people more legal aid for those that are defending a case .
at least then only those worthy of it will be using the funding

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several in existence already -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/selectiveaid/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
